title: Welcome to Korror!
text: Happy to see you here adventurer. This is the begining of this project. This game is a TCG/CCG mixed with role mechanics that brings strategy to your phone. Please join and hang with us in our social media

title: Korror version 0.0.1
text:
Today, version 0.0.1 of Korror is released. New features include:
* Improved Tavern visuals
